item.title: Procedural level generation in video games using Unity
item.description: 1. Intro At the end of March this year, we spontaneously decided to participate in the 46th edition of Ludum Dare. If you’ve never heard of LD, you should know that it is one of the best-known (bi-)annual game jams. In a game jam, you are given X amount of time (in our case, 72 hours) to create a game from scratch. So in April 2020 – we did: meet Guinea Pug.
